required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy and Immunotherapy Combined With Probiotics in Patients With Potential/Resectable NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy and Immunotherapy Combined With Probiotics in Patients With Potential/Resectable Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

clinical_study.source: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and effect of neoadjuvant chemotherapy and immunotherapy combined with probiotics for early resectable NSCLC patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 90 days after the first medication or 30 days after the operation, whichever is later
90 days after the first medication or 30 days after the operation, whichever is later
28 days after the completion of three cycles of neoadjuvant therapy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks (±7 days) after the operation, then every 12 weeks for 2 years
12 weeks (±7 days) after the operation, then every 12 weeks for 2 years
1 year and 2 years after the operation
1 year and 2 years after the operation

secondary_outcome.description: Time from beginning of treatment to death or 2 year, whichever comes first

clinical_study.condition: Non-small Cell Lung Cancer Stage III

intervention.description: 3 cycles of nivolumab+Paclitaxel (albumin-bound type)+ Carboplatin AUC5 (21 days/cycle); as well as BiFico (oral taking, 4 capsules/time, 2 times per day)

overall_official.affiliation: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

facility.name: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

patient_data.ipd_description: all IPD that underlie results in a publication
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: IPD will be shared when the clinical trail is finished
